languages.text: {n}Рокочущий голос воина отдается дрожью в ваших костях.{/n} "Наш бесстрашный лидер — Леман Расс, потомок Всеотца. Наша обитель — Клык, чертог бессмертных, что возносится с Хребта мира до самой орбиты. Наш мир — Фенрис. Чувствуешь — каждое слово гремит ратной славой и зовет в кровавую бурю сражения! Вот каковы мы! И не бывать никому, схожему с нами!"

{n}Ulfar's rumbling voice seems to reverberate in your very bones.{/n} "Our fearless Wolf King is Leman Russ, son of the Allfather. Our world is Fenris, and our home the Fang, which rises from the World Spine into orbit. We are the thunder in the bloody storm of battle that calls to us! That is who we are!"
languages.original_text: {n}Рокочущий голос воина отдается дрожью в ваших костях.{/n} "Наш бесстрашный лидер — Леман Расс, потомок Всеотца. Наша обитель — Клык, чертог бессмертных, что возносится с Хребта мира до самой орбиты. Наш мир — Фенрис. Чувствуешь — каждое слово гремит ратной славой и зовет в кровавую бурю сражения! Вот каковы мы! И не бывать никому, схожему с нами!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling voice seems to reverberate in your very bones.{/n} "Our fearless leader is Leman Russ, son of the Allfather. Our home is the Fang, hall of the immortal, which rises from the World Spine into orbit. Our world is Fenris. Feel it — every word thunders with martial glory and calls to the bloody storm of battle! That is who we are! And none can ever compare to us!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling voice seems to reverberate in your very bones.{/n} "Our fearless leader is Leman Russ, son of the Allfather. Our home is the Fang, hall of the immortal, which rises from the World Spine into orbit. Our world is Fenris. Feel it — every word thunders with martial glory and calls to the bloody storm of battle! That is who we are! And none can ever compare to us!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

Our home is the Fang, hall of the immortal, which rises from the World Spine into orbit. Our world is Fenris. Feel it — every word thunders with martial glory and calls to the bloody storm of battle! That is who we are! And none can ever compare to us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling voice seems to reverberate in your very bones.{/n} "Our fearless Wolf King is Leman Russ, son of the Allfather. Our world is Fenris, and our home the Fang, which rises from the World Spine into orbit. We are the thunder in the bloody storm of battle that calls to us! That is who we are!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法低沉的声音，仿佛在你全身的骨骼中回响。{/n}“我们无畏的狼王叫做黎曼·鲁斯，是全父的儿子。我们的世界叫做芬里斯，我们的家园叫做狼牙圣殿，从世界之脊一直延伸到星轨。血腥的风暴呼唤着我们，而我们就是风暴的怒吼！这就是我们！”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling voice seems to reverberate in your very bones.{/n} "Our fearless Wolf King is Leman Russ, son of the Allfather. Our world is Fenris, and our home the Fang, which rises from the World Spine into orbit. We are the thunder in the bloody storm of battle that calls to us! That is who we are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法低沉的声音，仿佛在你全身的骨骼中回响。{/n}“我们无畏的领袖叫做黎曼·鲁斯，是全父的儿子。我们的家园叫做狼牙圣殿，从世界之脊一直延伸到星轨，那里是不朽者的殿堂。我们的世界叫做芬里斯。感受这一切吧，每个字都闪烁着战斗的光辉，呼唤着血腥的风暴！这就是我们！我们无人能及！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz de Ulfar parece retumbar en tus huesos.{/n} «Nuestro valeroso Rey Lobo es Leman Russ, hijo del Padre de todas las cosas. Nuestro mundo es Fenris y nuestro hogar es el Colmillo, salón de los inmortales, que se yergue desde la Espina del Mundo hasta la órbita. ¡Somos el trueno de la sangrienta tempestad de la batalla! ¡Eso es lo que somos!».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling voice seems to reverberate in your very bones.{/n} "Our fearless Wolf King is Leman Russ, son of the Allfather. Our world is Fenris, and our home the Fang, which rises from the World Spine into orbit. We are the thunder in the bloody storm of battle that calls to us! That is who we are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Ulfar parece retumbar en tus huesos.{/n} «Nuestro valeroso líder es Leman Russ, hijo del Padre de todas las cosas. Nuestro hogar es el Colmillo, salón de los inmortales, que se yergue desde la Espina del Mundo hasta la órbita. Nuestro mundo es Fenris. Siéntalo. ¡Cada una de estas palabras resuena con gloria marcial y clama a la tormenta sangrienta de la batalla! ¡Eso es lo que somos! ¡Y nadie se nos puede comparar!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーのけたたましい声は、骨の髄まで響きそうだ。{/n}「俺達の恐れ知らずの狼王は、全知の父の息子であるレマン・ラスだ。俺達の世界はフェンリスで、ワールドスパインから軌道に上がる<牙城>こそ我が家。俺達は、俺達を呼ぶ戦という血まみれの嵐に響く雷鳴！それこそが俺達だ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling voice seems to reverberate in your very bones.{/n} "Our fearless Wolf King is Leman Russ, son of the Allfather. Our world is Fenris, and our home the Fang, which rises from the World Spine into orbit. We are the thunder in the bloody storm of battle that calls to us! That is who we are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーのけたたましい声は、骨の髄まで響きそうだ。{/n}「俺達の恐れ知らずの狼王は、全知の父の息子であるレマン・ラスだ。俺達の世界はフェンリスで、ワールドスパインから軌道に上がる<牙城>こそ我が家。俺達は、俺達を呼ぶ戦という血まみれの嵐に響く雷鳴！それこそが俺達だ！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfars grollende Stimme scheint in deinen Knochen widerzuhallen.{/n} "Unser furchtloser Wolfskönig ist Leman Russ, Sohn des Allvaters. Unsere Welt ist Fenris und unsere Heimat der Reißzahn, der sich aus dem Weltengrat in den Orbit erhebt. Wir sind der Donner im blutigen Sturm der Schlacht, die uns ruft! Das sind wir!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling voice seems to reverberate in your very bones.{/n} "Our fearless Wolf King is Leman Russ, son of the Allfather. Our world is Fenris, and our home the Fang, which rises from the World Spine into orbit. We are the thunder in the bloody storm of battle that calls to us! That is who we are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfars grollende stimme scheint in deinen Knochen widerzuhallen.{/n} "Unser furchtloser Anführer ist Leman Russ, Sohn des Allvaters. Unsere Heimat ist der Reißzahn, die Halle der Unsterblichen, die sich aus dem Weltengrat in den Orbit erhebt. Unsere Welt ist Fenris. Spürt es — jedes Wort donnert vor martialischem Ruhm und ruft den blutigen Sturm der Schlacht an Das sind wir! Und niemand kann uns das Wasser reichen!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voix rocailleuse d'Ulfar semble résonner jusque dans vos os.{/n} « Notre intrépide Roi Loup n'est autre que Leman Russ, le fils du Père de Tous. Fenris est notre monde et le Croc, notre foyer qui s'étend de l'Échine du Monde jusqu'à l'orbite. Nous sommes le tonnerre grondant dans la tempête sanglante des batailles qui nous appellent ! Voilà qui nous sommes ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling voice seems to reverberate in your very bones.{/n} "Our fearless Wolf King is Leman Russ, son of the Allfather. Our world is Fenris, and our home the Fang, which rises from the World Spine into orbit. We are the thunder in the bloody storm of battle that calls to us! That is who we are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix rocailleuse d'Ulfar semble résonner jusque dans vos os.{/n} « Notre chef intrépide n'est autre que Leman Russ, le fils du Père de Tous. Notre foyer est le Croc, la salle des immortels, qui s'étend de l'Échine du Monde jusqu'à l'orbite. Notre monde est Fenris. Le sentez-vous ? Chaque mot résonne de gloire martiale et vous incite à plonger au beau milieu de la tempête sanglante de la bataille ! Voilà qui nous sommes ! Et personne ne nous arrive à la cheville ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling voice seems to reverberate in your very bones.{/n} "Our fearless Wolf King is Leman Russ, son of the Allfather. Our world is Fenris, and our home the Fang, which rises from the World Spine into orbit. We are the thunder in the bloody storm of battle that calls to us! That is who we are!"

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'ın gürleyen sesi, kemiklerini titretiyor.{/n} "Korkusuz Kurt Kralımız Leman Russ, Yücebaba'nın oğludur. Dünyamız Fenris, yuvamız ise Dünya Omurgası'ndan yörüngeye yükselen Diş'tir. Biz, kulağımıza fısıldayan kanlı savaş fırtınasının gürültüsüyüz! Biz buyuz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling voice seems to reverberate in your very bones.{/n} "Our fearless Wolf King is Leman Russ, son of the Allfather. Our world is Fenris, and our home the Fang, which rises from the World Spine into orbit. We are the thunder in the bloody storm of battle that calls to us! That is who we are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar'ın gürleyen sesi kemiklerini titretiyor.{/n} "Korkusuz Kurt Kralımız Leman Russ, Yücebaba'nın oğludur. Dünyamız Fenris, yuvamız ise Dünya Omurgası'ndan yörüngeye yükselen Diş'tir. Biz, kulağımıza fısıldayan kanlı savaş fırtınasının gürültüsüyüz! Biz buyuz!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
